11.title: Adventure time!

choices: She makes something in her lab that helps her gain.
111.content:
Princess Bubblegum was in her throne room on a uneventful day. She was passing the time by eating (you guessed it) canndy! In fact as of late it seemed like that was all she was doing lately and it had taken its tole on her body. It looked as if she had added fifty pounds onto her body in the last week!

Later that same day the Princes had placed her hand into a bag of chocolates but her hand was met by the bottom of the bag. "Oh glob darn it not again! Peppermint butler could you bring me some more chocolates?" Asked the Princes. "Um I'm sorry my lady but that was the last bag but we do have some special ice cream if that's okay?" Apologized Peppermint butler. "That's fine thank you!" Peppermint butler then rushed of and after tem minutes he returned with a veary large bowl of ice cream that was about the same size as doctor Ice cream (It's not)! Princes bubblegum then picked up a spone and stated eat from the massive mound of ice cream. "Mmmm this is so good!" The Princes then began to eat the ice cream with great haste! Spoon full after spoon full the ice cream slowly disappeared into the princess mouth untill it was all gone. "Mmmm I can't believe how good that was!" Bubblegum said while rubbing her swollen gut. After a half a hour the swelling had gone down but she was still rubbing her belly and she actually liked it better when it was soft and squishy infact she liked it so much she wanted more!

How dose plump herself up?
111.title: Princess bubblegum

choices: Triple the calories in any food that I pour it on!"
Make it so I can make my self hungry any time I want.
Make me gain a ten pounds for every 10,000 calories I eat!"

Bubblegum then heaved her self out of her chair and started to walk to her lab while she held her stomach in her arms. Once she got to her lab she started to mix some chemicals around, doing math on a chalk board and reading from books all while eating the icecream that peperment butler had brought down and after a hour of tireless work she had finally succeeded. "Yes if this formula is correct this potion should…………

When Peppermint butler came back to the lab he had brought with him a large amount of non-living candy (okay for the rest of the story unless the story says that she is eating living candy she is not) and as soon as it was in reach Bubblegum imidiotly started to eat the candy. After all the candy was eaten Bubblegum was full and her stomach was veary swollen, but since she wanted more food she concentrated hard and the potion took effect and she became hungry again and asked for more food but Peppermin butler objected. "What, why not?!" Asked Bubblegum. "Because you need to get ready for the banquet tonight malady!" Replied Peppermint butler. "Oh no I almost forgot.....wait I did forget who's coming again?" Bubblegum asked as she brushed can't crumbs of her dress. "The guest are......

It dos'nt matter how big you are I'll all ways love you!"
I Acctualy like you this way!"
1211.content:
It has been ten years since Aang defeated Phoenix king Sozin and the world had entered a era of peace, long boring peace.

Katara was in the bed room of the house she and Aang had bought in the earth kingdom and she was getting ready to start her day. She was getting dressed when she noticed that her cloths were tighter much tighter but she continued to get dressed. Once she was dressed she went down the stairs into the kitchen for breakfast. When she walked into the kitchen she saw that Aang had prepared a veary large breakfast. "Good morning katara ready for breakfast Katara?" Asked Aang. "Yes I am." Katara then sat down and Aang brought over a small plate of assorted fruit for him self and a large plate of pastries for Katara and placed it in front of her then sat down and started to eat but Katara hesitated. "Um Aang it's nice that you made all of this just for me but don't you think I'm getting kind of fat?" Katara said while starring down her food. "Um yeah about that........
1211.title: Katara

choices: Alternat universe where all females are fat.
1311.title: Lila

choices: She crash lands on a planet made out of food.
13113.title: Other choices.

choices: All the food on the planet is very fatining for girls.
131131.content: Fry, and Bender were both aboard the planet express ship ready to make a delivery but Lila was taking her time getting the ship ready before take off and Bender and Fry were getting tired of waiting. "Come on Lila you've been keeping us waiting forever can we please go already?" Asked Fry. "Fry, you being to nice you've got to be rude to get what you want, I will now demonstrate." Bender then walked up behind Lila. "LET'S GO ALREADY!" Yelled Bender. "No." Said Lila. "I said, let's, go, already!" Bender the mashed a bunch of buttons and the ship took off very fast and slammed Fry, Bender and Lila against the back wall of the cockpit and knocked Lila out leaving no one to fly the ship as it zoomed through space. After a hour Lila woke up to find Fry and Bender freaking out because the ship was about to crash but Lila got to the controls and pulled up just before the ship crashed and slowed the ship just enough so that the crash didn't kill them. Bender, Fry and Lila walked out of the ship and found that the ship was buriein some kind of pink snow. Lila looked at the snow and bent down ran her finger through it and tasted it. "Just as I thought, it's strawberry ice cream that means this is planet Junkfoodia! (Yeah that's what I named the planet so deal with it!) The planet made interlay out of food and drinks!" Said Lila. "Well that explains the fried chickin mountain, the candy cane trees and the river of beer." Said Fry. "I don't see what the big deal is it's just, did you say river of beer?" Asked bender. "Yes." Bender then ran off to the river screaming beer over and over leaving Fry and Lila on top off the ice cream hill. Fry stomach rumbled as he was now hungry so he bent down to get some ice cream but Lila stoped him because........
131131.title: She crash lands on a planet made out of food.

choices: All the food on the planet is highly addictive for girls.
1311312.title: Somthing else.

choices: Not only did the ice cream regenerate but there was more!
13113122.content: Lila had just slapped the food out of Fry's hand and Fry was now angry. "Why the hell did you do that?" Yelled Fry. "Becase all the food on this planet is highly addictive and very fattening for girls." Said Lila. "But I'm not a girl!" Said Fry. "Oh, right, go ahead and eat then, but only eat the healthy parts of the planet." Said Lila. "Fine, mom!" Fry then walked of to find something to eat. "Now to contact the professor and get us off this planet.....right after I get some of this ice cream." Lila the got on her hands and knees and started to eat the ice cream. After ten minutes Lila had eaten more then her fill and she was to stuffed to move, but after the food had digested she went back to the spot she was eating before but found that....

choices: She decides to stop and try to contact the professor.
She takes it as a challenge to eat the whole planet.

131131222.title: Not only did the ice cream regenerate but there...

1311312221.content: "I think I should try to contact the professor before I completely lose controle!" Lila then got up, walked back inside of the ship and contacted the professor and told him what happened. "Don't worry Lewis we will come right out and save you, Burger and Presser." Said the Professor. "Who the hell is Lewis, Burger and Presser?" Asked Lila. "They were da last crew that the professor forgot about before you!" Said Hermes in the background. "Quick every one we have to save Lewis and his crew!" Said the professor as he walked away and Amy walked up to the screen. "Don't worry Lila I'll make sure we do come and save you.....um have you gained weight?" Lila then turned off the communicator and walked out of the ship. "Hmmm I'm going to be here a while might as well find something to do." Lila's stomach growled and she decided to eat some more of the planet. Lila walked over to the spot she was eating at before and started to eat again but just like last time once she was done eating the ice cream had regenarated four times the amount that she had eaten. Lila saw this and thought the planet wanted her to......
1311312221.title: She decides to stop and try to contact the prof...

choices: Decided to stop for a while.
Decided to eat even more even faster!
13113122211.content: The effect of the food had tricked Lila into thinking that the planet wanted her to continue to eat so this is what she did! She laid down on her expanded front, laid her arms on the ground and spread her arms as far as they could and dug them into the ice cream and moved them toward her mouth and the ice cream moved to and went into her mouth and she then repeated this process over and over. As gallon after gallon of ice cream went into he stomach it grew bigger and bigger until it couldn't hold any more and she had to stop. "Uughh, so full! I can't, I can't eat any more.....for now." Lila then closed her eye and started to rub her stomach to help the ice cream digest/melt, and when it did the weight that was just located on her stomach had moved through out the rest of her body, but was still very big. It had pushed her shirt up and was now sticking out and hung down half way to her knees and had divided up into four fatty rolls. Her breast were now much bigger and had grown to the size of soccer balls and were filled to the brim with fat and milk and were very heavy. Her ass had also grown much bigger and each cheek was as big as a basket ball and her thighs were as thick as a young trees trunk. Her clothes had ripped in many spots because of her growth and were stained from the ice cream. Once Lila was ready to eat again she opened her eye and sure enough the twenty gallons of ice cream she ate had come back as eighty so Lila........
13113122211.title: Keep eating.

choices: Fry and Bender discover what Leela is doing and try to stop her
13113122212.content:
Leela watched as the ice cream that she had just eaten regenerated itself, and took it as a signal from the planet that it wanted her to eat it. The entire planet.

"No, it can't be. That's crazy," she said. "There's no way that I can eat an entire planet." The addictive and fattening effects of the ice cream began to kick in, making Leela quickly change her mind. "On the other hand, I guess it couldn't hurt to try." Leela then dove into the pile of ice cream and began shoveling it into her mouth as fast as she could. The more she ate, the more addicted she became, causing her to eat even faster. The super fattening food also made her rapidly gain weight, and within minutes she was hugely obese. Leela's white tank top rode up on her body exposing her enormous belly as she devoured pile after pile of food. Her black stretch pants grew tighter and struggled to contain her gigantic ass, but held steady. The gluttonous cyclops showed no signs of slowing down as her weight surpassed 1000 lbs. Leela's hunger only seemed to increase along with her size, and as she grew she began to eat faster and faster, which in turn caused her to expand even faster. Leela was a big bloated eating machine, and in no time she had finished off the entire pile of ice cream, weighing in at over 4000 lbs. She wasted no time in moving on to a mountain of cheeseburgers, eagerly downing the whole thing in half the time it took her to eat the ice cream, and causing her to double in size. Leela then ate an enormous mountain made of pizza, then the fried chicken mountain, and then moved on to a huge valley made entirely of candy, after which she weighed over 100,000 lbs.
13113122212.title: Eat the whole planet!

Said Homer as he started to look for something else to eat. " Well Lisa is a growing girl and she needs food!" Said Marge was Homer came into the room with a box of cookies. "And what's your excuse?" Asked Homer. "Becuase I know you want me to be a growing girl!" Said Marge in a seductive voice. "You know Lisa and Magie are asleep and Bart is at Milhouse's how about we go up stairs?" Said Homer.

Later that nite Lisa had woke up from her nap and found every one asleep so she dicided to…

155312.title: Brotherhood.

15531221.content:
Okay so I'm going to do this a little different. I'm going to put the causes for her weight gain here and then you pick the next part based on which one you want.

Cause for gain number one.
After the battle with father work slows down and she gets board and starts eating more.

Cause for gain number two.
She starts dating Roy Mustang after he becomes fürher and he spoils her and she starts to gain, or she find out he likes fat girls or both.

Cause for gain number three.
She starts dating Mustang before the finale battle and when he goes missing during a mission she starts to comfort eat.

Cause for gain number four.
And lastly my favorite cause for female gain, alternant universe where all females are fat and want to get even fatter.
15531221.title: Yes!

155312211.title: Choice one or two.

choices: Fast forward to Roy picking up Riza. They have Romantic dinner before they leave
Fast forward to them arriving at the hotel.
1553122112.content: Commander (she had been promoted) Riza Hwakeye was sitting at the desk in her new office and she was messing with her new, standard female officers uniform. 'Damn this tiny skirt.' Thought Riza as she tried to get her tiny mini-skirt to cover her better, and it didn't help that recently she had gained a little weight about ten pounds to be exact, but she hadn't noticed. 'If I knew that he was serious about all female officers having to wear mini-skirts once he became fürher I would never have helped him get the position, but I have to admit it has been nice having him give me any thing I want.' And as if on cue Roy entered her office with his hands behind his back. "Oh I was just thinking about you." Riza quickly stoped messing with her skirt, stood up and saluted him. "We are alone you don't have to do that, and besides I don't even like it when you do that in public." Riza blushed and sat back down. "Sorry force of habit." Roy walked over to her and gave her a kiss on the cheek which made her blush even more, but he kept his hand behind his back. "So you said you were thinking about me, do you mind telling me about what?" Asked Roy. "I was thinking that the next time I see you I'm going shoot you for making me wear this way to small mini-skirt!" Said Riza as she reached for her gun. "Whoa now, if you shoot me then you can't have your gift." Said Roy trying to bargain for his life. "Really, what did you get me?" Riza had stopped reaching for her gun and started to smiling. Roy pulled his left arm out from behind his back and put a large heart shaped box full of assorted chocolates on Riza's desk. "Roy that's so sweat but I'm still trying to finish the last box you gave me last week." Riza picked up the box and put it in a drawer in her desk. "That's not all." Roy put down a pamphlet for a very nice resort on Riza's desk and she picked it up and read it. "What's this ... Roy this is wonderful, but I have so much work to do." Riza put the pamphlet back down on her desk. "Don't worry about it, I've got some one who would be glad to take over for you while we are away." Riza stood up and started hugging Roy. "You're to sweet, let me just wrap up a few things and then i will get ready." Riza sat back down and went back to her paper work. "Okay I will come by later and pick you up okay." Roy turned to face the door and left the room. Once Roy left Riza reached into the drawer and took out the box of chocolates and started to eat them while she worked.
1553122112.title: Choice two.

choices: Roy helps Riza work off her meal.
15531221122.content:
The cab pulled up infront of the Shining Palace hotel and spa and Riza ad Roy steeped out. "This place is amazing!" Said Riza. "Only the best for you!" Said Roy who was struggling to carry Riza's heavy bags along with his own. "I'm going to go look around while you check us in." Riza ran inside and left Roy alone with the bags.

"Finaly!" Roy put the bags down on the floor of the suit and lied down on the king sized bed. "This place is so nice." Said Riza after sitting down next to Roy. "Glad you enjoying it, I couldn't see any thing past your bags!" Roy sat up in the bed and looked at Riza with a angry look. "Oh shut up, at least you're not completely bli-*grrww*" Riza's stomach interrupted her saving her from saying something stupid. "Hungry?" Asked Roy. "I guess so." Riza started to blush again. "It's okay I'm a bit hungry myself." Roy picked up the rooms phone and dialed room service.

Half a hour later the food had arrived and Roy set up their meal. He had ordered a steak and green beans for himself and for Riza he got a large serving of spaghetti and meatballs as well as two large stakes with a side of green beans and mashed potatoes and a basket full of buttered bread to go with the spaghetti. "Roy isn't this a bit much?" Asked Riza as she sat down. "Well if you don't want to eat it and can have something else prepared for you." Replied Roy. "No I don't want it to go to waste, just maybe a little less next time okay." Riza and Roy began to eat their food. A while later Rky had finished his food and Riza was full. "Ugh that was so good, I couldn't eat another bite!" Said Riza while rubbing her bloated middle. "I thought you didn't want any of it to go to waste?" Said Roy "What do you mean?" Asked Riza. "You said you didn't want any of the food to go to waste, but there is still a lot of food left." Replied Roy. "I'm to full I can barely move!" Said Riza. "I can feed it to you!" Said Roy. "Hmmm okay, just watch my stomach, it's really sore." Roy got up and sat next to Riza and started to feed her the large amount of food that was left over.

Later....
15531221122.title: Fast forward to them arriving at the hotel.

Rules
